Plot: A documentary shot by film-makers all over the world that serves as a time capsule to show future generations what it was like to be alive on the twenty-fourth of July, 2010.
Title: Life in a Day
Actors: Hiroaki Aikawa, Cindy Baer, Teagan Bentley, Ester Brym
Director: Loressa Clisby, Kevin Macdonald, Hiroaki Aikawa, Natalia Andreadis, Jack Attridge, Cristina Bocchialini, Zillah Bowes, Ferran Brooks, Andrea Dalla Costa, Lisa Cottrell-Bentley, Alejo Crisóstomo, Ayman El Gazwy, Jane Haubrich, Soma Helmi, Jennifer M. Howd, Clementine Isaac, Aditya Kolli, Gabor Kukucska, Francesco La Regina, Frederic Lumiere, Marek Mackovic, Linda Matarasso, Kevin McMahon, Joseph Michael, Joaquin Montalvan, Lilit Movsisyan, Emmanuelle Pickett, Alejandro Romeo, Alaa Sheikh Hassan, Marcus Tedenryd, Zuqy
Language: German, Hindi, Russian, Portuguese, Quechua, English, Italian, Bengali, Spanish, Balinese, Arabic, Vietnamese, Ukrainian, Japanese, Indonesian, Creole, Catalan, Dutch, Masai
